thread.title: Tweet, tweet: AirAsia’s Tony Fernandez does social media in the air
thread.title_full: Tweet, tweet: AirAsia’s Tony Fernandez does social media in the air

title: Tweet, tweet: AirAsia’s Tony Fernandez does social media in the air
text:
Print Article 
KUALA LUMPUR, July 1 — Tony Fernandez proudly announced his first Tweet while flying AirAsia. — Twitter pic AirAsia now has Twitter access enabled onboard, thanks to a partnership with inflight entertainment and connectivity provider roKKi. 
Tan Sri Tony Fernandes, AirAsia Group CEO tweeted for the first time from 10,000ft above sea level, ith Aliza Knox, Twitter managing director, online sales, Asia Pacific along for the ride. 
The special package is RM9 for 3MB of data. 
roKKi Chats is currently available on selected AirAsia aircraft. For updates, just follow @roKKi_official on Twitter or visit the company's Facebook page . More Stories for You:
